definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to keep one's eyes open (idiom)/to be on one's guard/to be clear-eyed
to lie through one's teeth (idiom)/to talk drivel
pinyin: zheng1 zhe5 yan3 jing1 shuo1 xia1 hua4

definition: see 沒長眼睛|没长眼睛[mei2 zhang3 yan3 jing5]
(coll.) are you blind or something?/look where you're going
(slang) (Tw) to be checking out the hotties
pinyin: yan3 jing5 chi1 bing1 qi2 lin2

definition: lit. to catch sparrows blindfolded (idiom)/fig. to act blindly
pinyin: bi4 se4 yan3 jing1 zhuo1 ma2 que4

sentences.english: But I can do it with my eyes closed.
sentences.chinese: 但我熟悉得闭着眼睛都能做。

sentences.english: Behind the thick lens of her glasses her blue-green eyes 3)clouded with concern.
sentences.chinese: 透过厚厚的眼镜片，她那蓝绿色的眼睛满是担忧。

sentences.english: I am speaking English but you are acting like sheep, only looking wide-eyed.
sentences.chinese: 我讲的是英语，但你表现的像只绵羊，只是睁大眼睛。

sentences.english: But developing awareness is not connected with having the eyes closed.
sentences.chinese: 但是，培养觉性与闭眼睛是没有关连的。

sentences.english: Tear ducts operate on a normal basis to lubricate and protect the eye.
sentences.chinese: 泪管通常可以湿润并保护眼睛。

sentences.english: A magnificent gleam of triumph sprang into Cowper-wood's eye.
sentences.chinese: 柯帕伍德的眼睛里突然透露出胜利的庄严的光芒来。

sentences.english: Click on the little eye icon on the left hand side of the ‘Background’ layer so it makes this particular layer invisible.
sentences.chinese: 单击背景图层左边的眼睛图标，这样能使它不可见。

sentences.english: " With this word, Zhanbo asks her with affection in his eyes. "What about you?
sentences.chinese: 说到这，展博眼睛里充满深情，“你呢？”

sentences.english: And our Eyes tell each other, what neither dares Name.
sentences.chinese: 我们的眼睛告诉彼此那都不敢说的爱。

sentences.english: Now pleases go to the treated room to have your eyes cleared.
sentences.chinese: 现在请到治疗室清洗一下眼睛。

sentences.english: She shut her eyes in fear.
But after he put his head on he could not find his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 但当他将头放回后，却找不到自己的眼睛了。

sentences.english: His eyes drooped even as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 当他说的时候，他的眼睛甚至下垂。

sentences.english: Her big eyes are her most striking feature.
sentences.chinese: 大眼睛是她容貌最显著的特点。

sentences.english: My eyes water profusely now, as do my salivary glands.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛水大汗现在一样，我的唾液腺。

sentences.english: The smoke is stinging my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 烟把我的眼睛熏得很疼。

definition: mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
